function mintAgreement(address client, address freelancer, uint256 jobId, uint256 amount, string tokenURI) external returns (uint256)
function updateStatus(uint256 jobId, string newStatus) external
function getAgreement(uint256 tokenId) external view returns (tuple(address client, address freelancer, uint256 jobId, uint256 amount, string status, uint256 createdAt))
function ownerOf(uint256 tokenId) external view returns (address)
event AgreementMinted(uint256 indexed tokenId, uint256 indexed jobId, address indexed client, address indexed freelancer)
event AgreementStatusUpdated(uint256 indexed tokenId, string newStatus)
